lead_paragraph: The Iranian president’s remarks, in an interview with an Italian newspaper, appeared at odds with those of Iran’s supreme leader, at least in tone.

headline.main: Iran President Doesn’t Rule Out Normalized U.S. Ties One Day
headline.print_headline: Iran President Says U.S. Ties Are Possible

snippet: The Iranian president’s remarks, in an interview with an Italian newspaper, appeared at odds with those of Iran’s supreme leader, at least in tone.
